thread.title: Eric Church pulls off epic, close to four-hour show at Q: Check out the highlights from the 'Holdin' My Own' tour
thread.title_full: Eric Church pulls off epic, close to four-hour show at Q: Check out the highlights from the 'Holdin' My Own' tour

author: Emily Bamforth, cleveland.com
title: Eric Church pulls off epic, close to four-hour show at Q: Check out the highlights from the 'Holdin' My Own' tour
text: Church played through more than 30 songs and captivated the Friday night crowd at Quicken Loans Arena.
